body: This seems to be the standard `OpenGL out of memory` error. Not sure if we can do much here (with just those logs).

Looks like the same problem as https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9739 and sadly https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/12014 didn't make it into the new release so there is no way to further investigate this.

another one ... they happen rarely , but they happen

well, i checked for difference ... but there is none ... so i guess it makes no sense to post any more of these ...

Your @Mesa3D version is from October 24, 2014 and therefore rather old. Try updating it with the latest version or the bugfix point releases. Compare https://www.gamingonlinux.com/articles/feral-interactive-are-asking-canonical-to-get-mesa-updates-into-an-official-ppa.8559
